title: Ice cream : manufacturing sales volume in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2009 to 2018
summary: The statistic shows the manufacturers ( Ice ) volume of sporting goods equipment , fitness equipment , sales apparel , athletic footwear , and sales licensed merchandise in the period from 2009 to 2018 .
In 2018 , Ice volume amounted to about 328055 thousand liters .

Sporting goods manufacturers Ice volume - additional information Ice volume of sporting goods in the liters reached 442961 thousand liters in 2010 , the highest figure to-date and a eight thousand liters dollar increase on the figure from 2014 .
gold: During 2018 , the sales volume of ice cream manufactured in the UK amounted to approximately 328 million liters.
From 2013 to 2014 , sales fell by over a hundred million liters and have not recovered since.
Before this decline , sales were rather stable at over 420 million liters .
